text: Seriously couldn't find it. Next adafruit order? <https://www.adafruit.com/product/2144>

attachments.title: Flex Cable for Raspberry Pi Camera - 2 meters
attachments.text: This cable will let you swap out the stock 150mm long flex cable from a Raspberry Pi Camera (either &#39;classic&#39; or &#39;NoIR&#39; type) for a different size. Works great, just ...
attachments.fallback: Flex Cable for Raspberry Pi Camera - 2 meters
